      @RequestMapping(value="/add", method=POST) public String add(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model, Long[] tagId, String title, String content, String amount, String point, String token, String captchaKey, String captchaValue, String jumpUrl, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttrs, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception

      response -

    • upload

      @RequestMapping(value="/upload", method=POST) @ResponseBody public String upload(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model, String dir, String fileName, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception
      文件上传
      参数:
      dir - : 上传类型，分别为image、file
      fileName - 文件名称 预签名时有值 员工发话题 上传文件名为UUID + a + 员工Id 用户发话题 上传文件名为UUID + b + 用户Id
      抛出:
      Exception
